name: Fourier machine [test 2]
description:
-------------------------------------------------------
Testing the Fourier machine:
-------------------------------------------------------

Toggle between PLAY and CONSTRUCTION mode: [return key]

#######################################################
# Commands in PLAY mode:                              #
#######################################################

  Toggle automatic color change:                    [c]
  Change color manually:                  [mouse wheel]
  Change line thickness:                        [+]/[-]
  Toggle pause drawing:                     [space bar]
  Clear drawing:                          [right-click]

#######################################################
# Commands in CONSTRUCTION mode:                      #
#######################################################

- Commands when mouse NOT over a segment: -------------
    Toggle pause rotation:                  [space bar]
    Add or remove segments:               [mouse wheel]
  
- Commands when mouse over a segment: -----------------
    Change radius:                              [+]/[-]
                            or [hold left mouse button]
    When not paused: change speed:        [mouse wheel]


-------------------------------------------------------
Required feedback/ideas:
-------------------------------------------------------

- Aesthetics: anything to improve?
- Needed to make it more "meaningful"?
- Additional key for generating a new machine (same as refresh page)?
- Construction or play mode too complicated/non-intuitive?
- Is it fun to play/watch?
- Maximum number of segments could be increased; drawings get more complex and less predictable
- Is there a better way t change colors? Is it too rainbowy?
- Problems with discontinuous lines when rotation speeds are high --> is this really a problem?


-------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
-------------------------------------------------------

- Have to test restricting the rotation speed ratios of the several segments to integer values. This should be more according to the mathematical concept established by Fourier.
